summary: Scenic home with locks, Weapon Racks, Display Cases, Book Shelves, and Potion Racks.  4 levels and sleeps up to 5 companions. Potion racks and several table tops that work like bookshelves.
descriptionHtml:
Quiet scenic location for this player home with mining on site.  2 levels above ground provide provide a small footprint that fits in nicely into the forest location.  2 levels below ground that provide all the storage and sleeping requirements for player and multiple followers as well as many display cases and weapon racks.  Several mannequins are provided for armor display as well.
There is alchemy and enchanting areas in the sub-basement and full smithing and smelting outside.

Shelves and table tops in many areas work like bookshelves to allow you to easily store and display potions, ingredients, and books all on the same shelf or table.

Can sleep up to 5 followers.  Idle markers should allow followers to stay busy if you have a follower wander mod.  Idle markers are in all areas of the location inside and outside.  I use http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9504

Keys on porch on between doors.

All suggestions for enhancements will be considered.

Install
=====
Best to use NMM but normal mod procedures will work for install. (There is 1 script file and 1 esp)

Enhancements
============
More table tops to place inventory items and expand items that can be stored on tables and shelves
More mining available on location
Indoor archery range and additional bedrooms to sleep up to 10 followers
Add shield and weapon rack to basement instead of just single weapon

Known bugs
==========
Mining can be quirky, sleeping offsite seems to help.  If not attack ore with Pickaxe has worked.

Location
=======
NorthWest of Falkreath very near the Half-Moon Mill

COC Info
========
Exterior location is forestrefugeexterior01
Interior cell is aforestrefuge
author: Merdynn
